typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SEQ as string,
		NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		EXTENSION as string,
		MOBILE as string,
		ENTITYCR as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp,
		ID_ERROR_CODE as integer,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> stgcontacterrlog
stgcontacterrlog derive(DS_FILENAME = replace((replace(DS_FILENAME,'.xlsx','_err.csv')),'.xls','_err.csv')) ~> dsfilename
dsfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DS_FILENAME',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		SEQ,
		NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE,
		EXTENSION,
		MOBILE,
		ENTITYCR,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME,
		ID_ERROR_CODE,
		DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> errorlogcontact
